verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David בְּֽבוֹא־ <WH935> came אֵ֭לָיו <WH413> when נָתָ֣ן <WH5416> when Nathan הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he בָּ֝֗א <WH935> unto him after he had gone in אֶל־ <WH413> about בַּת־ שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH1339> to Bathsheba חָנֵּ֣נִי <WH2603> Have mercy אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> upon me O God כְּחַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> according to thy lovingkindness כְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> according unto the multitude רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <WH7356> of thy tender mercies מְחֵ֣ה <WH4229> blot out פְשָׁעָֽי׃ <WH6588> my transgressions
[הַרְבֵּה כ] (הֶ֭רֶב <WH7235> abundance ק) כַּבְּסֵ֣נִי <WH3526> Wash מֵעֲוֹנִ֑י <WH5771> from mine iniquity וּֽמֵחַטָּאתִ֥י <WH2403> me from my sin טַהֲרֵֽנִי׃ <WH2891> and cleanse
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פְ֭שָׁעַי <WH6588> my transgressions אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> For I acknowledge וְחַטָּאתִ֖י <WH2403> and my sin נֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> before תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [is] ever

לְךָ֤ לְבַדְּךָ֨ ׀ <WH905> only חָטָאתִי֮ <WH2398> Against thee thee only have I sinned וְהָרַ֥ע <WH7451> [this] evil בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight עָ֫שִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> and done לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> So תִּצְדַּ֥ק <WH6663> that thou mightest be justified בְּדָבְרֶ֗ךָ <WH1696> when thou speakest תִּזְכֶּ֥ה <WH2135> [and] be clear בְשָׁפְטֶֽךָ׃ <WH8199> when thou judgest
הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold בְּעָו֥וֹן <WH5771> in iniquity חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי <WH2342> Behold I was shapen וּ֝בְחֵ֗טְא <WH2399> and in sin יֶֽחֱמַ֥תְנִי <WH3179> conceive אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> did my mother

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> truth חָפַ֣צְתָּ <WH2654> Behold thou desirest בַטֻּח֑וֹת <WH2910> in the inward parts וּ֝בְסָתֻ֗ם <WH5640> and in the hidden חָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> wisdom תוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3045> [part] thou shalt make me to know

תְּחַטְּאֵ֣נִי <WH2398> Purge בְאֵז֣וֹב <WH231> me with hyssop וְאֶטְהָ֑ר <WH2891> and I shall be clean תְּ֝כַבְּסֵ֗נִי <WH3526> wash וּמִשֶּׁ֥לֶג <WH7950> than snow אַלְבִּֽין׃ <WH3835> me and I shall be whiter

תַּ֭שְׁמִיעֵנִי <WH8085> Make me to hear שָׂשׂ֣וֹן <WH8342> joy וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> and gladness תָּ֝גֵ֗לְנָה <WH1523> may rejoice עֲצָמ֥וֹת <WH6106> [that] the bones דִּכִּֽיתָ׃ <WH1794> [which] thou hast broken
הַסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> Hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <WH6440> thy face מֵחֲטָאָ֑י <WH2399> from my sins וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹ֖נֹתַ֣י <WH5771> all mine iniquities מְחֵֽה׃ <WH4229> and blot out

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart טָ֭הוֹר <WH2889> in me a clean בְּרָא־ <WH1254> Create לִ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit נָ֝כ֗וֹן <WH3559> a right חַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH2318> and renew בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <WH7130> within

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥נִי <WH7993> Cast me not away מִלְּפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from thy presence וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> not thy holy אַל־ <WH408> not תִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> and take מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

הָשִׁ֣יבָה <WH7725> Restore לִּ֭י שְׂשׂ֣וֹן <WH8342> unto me the joy יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <WH3468> of thy salvation וְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> spirit נְדִיבָ֣ה <WH5081> me [with thy] free תִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <WH5564> and uphold

אֲלַמְּדָ֣ה <WH3925> [Then] will I teach פֹשְׁעִ֣ים <WH6586> transgressors דְּרָכֶ֑יךָ <WH1870> thy ways וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <WH2400> and sinners אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> about יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <WH7725> shall be converted

הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי <WH5337> Deliver מִדָּמִ֨ים ׀ <WH1818> me from bloodguiltiness אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> thou God תְּשׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH8668> of my salvation תְּרַנֵּ֥ן <WH7442> shall sing aloud לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י <WH3956> [and] my tongue צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> of thy righteousness
אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> O Lord שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> thou my lips תִּפְתָּ֑ח <WH6605> open וּ֝פִ֗י <WH6310> and my mouth יַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> shall shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> thy praise

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not תַחְפֹּ֣ץ <WH2654> For thou desirest זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> not sacrifice וְאֶתֵּ֑נָה <WH5414> else would I give ע֝וֹלָ֗ה <WH5930> not in burnt offering לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not תִרְצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> [it] thou delightest

זִֽבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> The sacrifices אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> of God ר֪וּחַ <WH7307> spirit נִשְׁבָּ֫רָ֥ה <WH7665> [are] a broken לֵב־ <WH3820> heart נִשְׁבָּ֥ר <WH7665> a broken וְנִדְכֶּ֑ה <WH1794> and a contrite אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God לֹ֣א <WH3808> You will not תִבְזֶֽה׃ <WH959> thou wilt not despise

הֵיטִ֣יבָה <WH3190> Do good בִ֭רְצוֹנְךָ <WH7522> in thy good pleasure אֶת־ <WH853> צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> unto Zion תִּ֝בְנֶ֗ה <WH1129> build חוֹמ֥וֹת <WH2346> thou the walls יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תַּחְפֹּ֣ץ <WH2654> Then shalt thou be pleased זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> with the sacrifices צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness עוֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> with burnt offering וְכָלִ֑יל <WH3632> and whole אָ֤ז <WH227> Then יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> then shall they offer עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <WH4196> upon thine altar פָרִֽים׃ <WH6499> bullocks
